title: Rep. Buddy Carter: The Road To Socialism Will Never Run Through Georgia
summary:

Buddy Carter (R-GA) talks about the importance of the two Senate races still yet to be determined in Georgia and why he's glad President Trump is still looking into possible election fraud in the 2020 Election.
"The road to socialism will never run through the state of Georgia.
We're inspired as a state that we are going to see the balance of power delivered in the United States Senate and therefore in the United States government.
And it will be delivered by two Republican Senators from the state of Georgia."
paragraphs: Embed the following code on your website:
Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

On Fox Across America with Jimmy Failla Rep. Buddy Carter (R-GA) talks about the importance of the two Senate races still yet to be determined in Georgia and why he's glad President Trump is still looking into possible election fraud in the 2020 Election.

"The road to socialism will never run through the state of Georgia. That's just not going to happen. We're not going to allow that to happen. We're inspired. We're inspired as a party. We're inspired as a state that we are going to see the balance of power delivered in the United States Senate and therefore in the United States government. And it will be delivered by two Republican Senators from the state of Georgia."

"I think the greater danger is if the President not challenged the results because he has a responsibility that I feel like he is fulfilling in challenging the results. It was a razor thin margin. Whether you're Republican, Democrat or Independent, everyone wants fair, transparent and honest elections. We all have to have that. So I applaud the President for what he's doing. But here is concern that we are losing our focus and not focusing on what we need to be focusing on, and that is these two senatorial races that are coming up on January 5th."
